showcase.title: Showcase Your Value
showcase.description: Highlight how your product solves user problems

trust.title: Build Trust
trust.description: Leverages social proof elements to establish trust and credibility

leads.title: Capture Leads
leads.description: Make your lead capture form visually appealing and strategic

section.subtitle: Core Features
section.title: What Sets Our Tool Apart
section.description: Discover a unique combination of AI-powered generation and intuitive editing to bring your creative ideas quickly and easily into the world of Minecraft.

ai_generation.title: AI-Powered Text-to-3D Generation
ai_generation.description: Simply describe your vision with words, and our AI precisely transforms it into an initial 3D model.

2d_to_3d.title: From 2D Images to 3D Objects
2d_to_3d.description: Upload your sketches, photos, or any 2D graphics and watch them convert into three-dimensional structures.

model_editing.title: Intuitive 3D Model Editing
model_editing.description: Effortlessly adjust details, shapes, and sizes of your 3D models using drag & drop and simple tools.

minecraft_export.title: Direct Export as Minecraft Blueprint
minecraft_export.description: Transfer your final models with just one click as playable structures or detailed blueprints into your Minecraft world.

easy_start.title: Easy Start
easy_start.description: Create impressive 3D models for Minecraft, even without any prior knowledge of complex 3D software.

design_styles.title: Various Design Styles
design_styles.description: Experiment with a wide range of styles – from realistic to fantastic – to implement your unique vision.

section.title: Benefits
section.heading: From Concept to Minecraft Masterpiece
section.description: Our tool revolutionizes how you create 3D models for Minecraft. Simply enter a prompt or upload a 2D image, modify the result, and watch it come alive in your Minecraft world.

from_idea.title: From Idea to 3D Model
from_idea.description: Effortlessly transform text prompts or 2D images into detailed 3D models. Your vision becomes tangible.

creative_freedom.title: Creative Freedom & Customization
creative_freedom.description: Intuitively modify and refine your generated 3D models to create unique creations.

seamless_conversion.title: Seamless to Minecraft Builds
seamless_conversion.description: Convert your 3D designs with ease directly into impressive and playable Minecraft structures.

unique_worlds.title: Create Unique Worlds
unique_worlds.description: Create distinctive Minecraft worlds faster than ever and share your masterpieces with the community.

community.title: Ready to join the Community?
community.description: Join the Discord community! Connect and share your creations. Click here and dive in!

section.subtitle: How it works
section.title: From idea to Minecraft structure in 4 steps

input.title: Start with your idea
input.description: Enter a simple text prompt or upload a 2D image. This is the spark for your 3D model.

generation.title: Automatic Model Creation
generation.description: Our AI analyzes your input and transforms it into a detailed 3D model in seconds.

customization.title: Refine your design
customization.description: Use intuitive tools to modify the generated 3D model, add details, and perfect it to match your vision.

integration.title: Directly into your world
integration.description: Convert your finished 3D model into an impressive Minecraft structure with one click, ready for your game.
